name: Cops + Robbers
description:
Cops + Robbers was originally made in 2017 using the original Game Maker Studio and recreated in 2022 using Game Maker Studio 2

This game was the second one I finished. It was heavily inspired by "Super Amazing Wagon Adventure" and I finished it in about a week or two.

How To Play:

Move Car: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Spacebar
